Uses of Package
tilt.handler

  • Packages that use tilt.handler 
    Package Description
    tilt.handler
    These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (tilt.handler.TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (tilt.handler.GeoJsonHandler).
    tilt.handler.get  
    tilt.handler.post  
    tilt.test
    This package is for testing the TILT Java webservice and is not required for the functioning of TILT.
  • Classes in tilt.handler used by tilt.handler 
    Class and Description
    TiltHandler
    Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
  • Classes in tilt.handler used by tilt.handler.get 
    Class and Description
    TiltGetHandler
    Handle a GET request for various image types, text, GeoJSON
    TiltHandler
    Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
  • Classes in tilt.handler used by tilt.handler.post 
    Class and Description
    TiltHandler
    Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
    TiltPostHandler
    Handle a PUT request (used for update)
  • Classes in tilt.handler used by tilt.test 
    Class and Description
    TiltHandler
    Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
